QuestData.Title: Leyline Feed: Halls of the Eclipse
QuestData.Description: <The leyline feed appears to be intact and undamaged, but is not functioning. An infusion of Ancient Mana should be enough to render it operational again.>
QuestData.AreaDescription: Infuse the leyline feed with Ancient Mana.
QuestData.LogDescription: Infuse the leyline feed with Ancient Mana.
QuestData.RewardText: <As you imbue the feed with the mana the structure stirs to life. Your skin tingles as the surrounding air becomes charged with arcane power.>
